The FRIENDS of Boys & Girls Clubs of Coachella Valley

This non-profit organization is to support the Boys & Girls Clubs of Coachella Valley by cooperating with the Chief Executive Officer and Board of Directors through fund raising and service projects. Join the Friends!

Join the Friends

The FRIENDS of Boys & Girls Clubs of Coachella Valley was established by a group of community-minded women residing in the Coachella Valley. As a member of this wonderful organization, you will have many opportunities to share your talents and skills. Moreover, you will enjoy a unique camaraderie with many of the active members of the FRIENDS. One of the fun–raising and fundraising activities hosted by the FRIENDS is Putting with a Purpose. Putting with a Purpose – Under the stars and under the lights of Indian Wells Golf Resort the FRIENDS host an evening of Glow – Golf, food, drinks and fun. All monies raised from fundraising activities and dues by the Friends go directly to support the 6,000+ Club Kids.
